Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 籢 from bamboo-top 𥫗竹 zhú and related phonetic collect (敛)斂 liǎn C360 奩<匳匲籢> simp 奁.

Decomposition notes 字形分解说明 :
(- 籢 is the oldest version) (- 籢 a bamboo 𥫗 box with a collection 斂 of stuff) (- 匳 a box 匚 pronounced like lian 僉) (- 奩 a big 大 box 匚 with stuff 品) (- 匲 a box 匚 with big 大 stuff 品)

籢字的基本解释

籢
lián
古同“奁”。

籢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lián］
［《廣韻》力鹽切，平鹽，來。］
同“匳1”。亦作“籨1”。
古代妇女梳妆用的镜匣。

籢字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【竹字部】　籢； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页905第13
【廣韻】力鹽切【集韻】離鹽切，?音廉。鏡籢也。【列女傳】置鏡籢中。【急就篇註】籢，盛鏡之器，若今鏡匣也。　又【廣韻】與匳同。盛香器。

籢字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lián］
["Guangyun" cut salt with force, flat salt, come. ]
Same as "匳1". Also known as "籨1".
A mirror box used by ancient women for dressing.

[Not set on] [Bamboo characters department] 　籢; Kangxi strokes: 23; Page number: page 905 13
[Guangyun] Salt cut with strength [Jiyun] Cut from salt, with low sound. Mirror 籢 also. [Biography of Women] In the mirror. [Anxiety to the article] Ai, a tool for holding a mirror, is also a mirror box.　[Guangyun] is the same as Jiao. Incense holder.
